io.micronaut.data.repository.async

Interface AsyncCrudRepository<E,ID>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The entity type
    ID - The ID type
    All Superinterfaces:
    GenericRepository<E,ID>

    public interface AsyncCrudRepository<E,ID>
extends GenericRepository<E,ID>
    Asynchronous variation of CrudRepository.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    graemerocher

<S extends E> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<S> save(@Valid @NotNull @NonNull

        Saves the given valid entity, returning a possibly new entity representing the saved state.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The generic type
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to save. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The saved entity will never be null.
        Throws:
        javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException - if the entity is null or invalid.

        Type Parameters:
        S - The generic type
        Parameters:
        entities - The entities to saved. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The saved entities objects. will never be null.
        Throws:

        Retrieves an entity by its id.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the entity to retrieve. Must not be null.
        Returns:
